title: Please identify this font

comments.content:
Looks like Edwardian Script Alt with a stroke added.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/edwardian-script/edwardian-scr-alt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220704/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/edwardian-script/edwardian-scr-alt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/edwardian-script/edwardian-scr-alt/")
